abstract: The shuffle at Bank of America shows that at some big banks, executives don’t stay chief financial officer for very long.
snippet: The shuffle at Bank of America shows that at some big banks, executives don’t stay chief financial officer for very long.
lead_paragraph: At some of the biggest banks, there has been a revolving door to the office of chief financial officer.

headline.main: Where Have All the Bank C.F.O.’s Gone?
